Event.Message: The attempt by user %2 to restart/shutdown computer %1 failed

Event.Message: The process %1 has initiated the %5 of computer %2 on behalf of user %7 for the following reason: %3 Reason Code: %4 Shutdown Type: %5 Comment: %6
